mapper.select: SELECT id, sum_bonus AS sumBonus, pending_bonus AS pendingBonus, used_bonus AS usedBonus, available_bonus AS availableBonus FROM WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( sum_bonus, pending_bonus, used_bonus, available_bonus, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{sumBonus}, #{pendingBonus}, #{usedBonus}, #{availableBonus}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )

INSERT INTO d_bonus_wallet_detail ( bonus_wallet_id, bonus_change, change_type, bef_sum_bonus, bef_pending_bonus, bef_available_bonus, bef_used_bonus, aft_sum_bonus, aft_pending_bonus, aft_available_bonus, aft_used_bonus, order_pay_item_id, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{bonusWalletId}, #{bonusChange}, #{changeType}, #{befSumBonus}, #{befPendingBonus}, #{befAvailableBonus}, #{befUsedBonus}, #{aftSumBonus}, #{aftPendingBonus}, #{aftAvailableBonus}, #{aftUsedBonus}, #{orderPayItemId}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
